https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/8pvkDjFOcnNwSzLRofXX5G03wzh.jpg Detective Ben Walls finds himself in a modern day Dante world, passing back and forth between the present and the future. Surrounded by the residents seeking redemption, Ben is left with the task to find a way out. Convergence
